official_title: A bill making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 95-1076) District of Columbia Appropriation Act - =Title I: Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia= - Appropriates a specified sum for the Temporary Commission on Financial Oversight of the District of Columbia for fiscal year 1979. =Title II: District of Columbia= - Appropriates specified sums for specified purposes for the District of Columbia for fiscal years 1978 and 1979. Sets forth prohibitions on the use of such funds, including: (1) payment of salaries of District of Columbia government employees whose name and salary are not available for public inspection; (2) publicity or propaganda purposes or any policy including boycott designed to support or defeat legislation before Congress or any State legislature; and (3) payments to District of Columbia government employees paid under the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 (CETA), until such Act shas been specifically amended.

titles.title: A bill making appropriations for the government of the District of Columbia and other activities chargeable in whole or in part against the revenues of said District for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1979, and for other purposes.
